title: Denver Arts Organized
desc: I have recently became the new director of a website documenting local art exhibitions, news, galleries, and events in the Denver area for nearly a decade and a half. I have been restructuring the database of over 8,000 posts to build a brand new look and feel.

title: Sounds True Publishing (Phase 2)
desc: A blog and podcast website using a scalable and modular system of hand-coded Wordpress plugins and Elementor components to work across multiple databases including their Shopify API.

title: Ando
desc: Ando is a shell script to set up a macOS laptop for clean and simple front-end web development environment.
